Sports Services

Operating the campus sports centres and sporting facilities, student sports services, engagement and partnership with governing sports bodies, sports events and civic engagement.

Sport Services

Ulster University Sports Services offers state of the art facilities and programmes for athletes of all ages. Sports Services membership and facilities are open to students, staff and members of the public.

  ulster.ac.uk/sport-new
